name: PBCD
description: Automated Method for Generating Secondary Motion using Position Based Dynamics
author: conrev

scripts.clean-docs: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && mkdir docs/assets
scripts.start: yarn run clean-docs && yarn run copy-assets-dev && parcel src/index.html
scripts.build-gh-pages: yarn run clean-docs && yarn run copy-assets-build && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir docs
scripts.playground: yarn run clean-docs && yarn run copy-assets && parcel src/fbxloader.html
